Plot: A political satire set in Turaqistan, a country occupied by an American private corporation run by a former US Vice-President. In an effort to monopolize the opportunities the war-torn ...
Title: War, Inc.
Writer: Mark Leyner, Jeremy Pikser, John Cusack
Actors: John Cusack, Hilary Duff, Marisa Tomei, Joan Cusack
tomatoConsensus: War, Inc. attempts to satirize the military industrial complex, but more often than not it misses its target.
